i18n.rebuildorupdateerrortip: This Holding field is not available, please rebuild it !
i18n.updatebt: Update：Get Title number subfield and update Call-no subfield,if Title number subfield already exists, Only Update Call-no subfield.
i18n.tip1: Please set call number field and sub-fields information for first time use.
i18n.tip2: Rebuild will delete the existing call number field and re-create a new call number field;
i18n.tip3: Update will create call number field if not exist, and keep the existing call number field if it already exists, just generating sub-fields of title number and call number.
i18n.errortip: Holding field、Classification number subfield、Title number subfield and Call-no subfield cannot be null！
i18n.Publishedyear: Pub. Year included in the call-no.
